content: my own valentine treat yourself to some extra love with this small and plush wool scarf it has a soft texture and an interesting construction with german short row and a touch of bubbles size 120cm wide 30cm deep yarn järbo svensk ull 2tr colorway 74104 100g/300m held together with rico design luxury alpaca cotton fusion colorway 001 50g/190m amount of yarn ca 210m of both yarns yarn alternatives sport weight wool yarn held together with fingering/sport weight fluffy yarn or dk weight wool yarn held together with lace weight fluffy yarn needles 5mm circular needles 80cm gauge 12st/10cm in garter stitch after blocking no problem if you are off gauge just try to knit loosely ktbl knit yo of the previous row through the back loop © 2026 ostseewelle all rights reserved 1 b
